entry.content:

entry.title: Please share and suport
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Please share and suport

Sanctuary4All Colorado is at Metro Caring. · Denver

Maria is selling with us for the second time this Saturday! She’ll be serving fettuccine alfredo with veggies, chicken, and shrimp. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All ColoradoEmergency Call to Action: We thought that with the Biden administration things would change for...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado

Emergency Call to Action: We thought that with the Biden administration things would change for many such as Jose Garcia but unfortunately that is not the case.... He has been fighting his deportation process for 8 years and only a week ago he received the terrible news that they denied his case. He went into the system for a minor traffic infraction. It is all he has on his record. He is the father of 5 kids, owner of his home and they are only giving him 60 days to leave this country where 10 have already gone by. He will not give up and will keep fighting to stay with his family and asking for another opinion where he will be making several processes. One will be an application in an attempt to remove his voluntary leave. Another will be to reevaluate the case to see if any errors were made by the lawyer. The third is if we do find errors another lawyer will be taking his case and these costs will be up to $12,000. He will be working in creating events to fundraise through Sanctuary4All but you all can help him stay with his family. Help him by donating what is possible and sharing this on all your social media platforms. Thank you and we will keep you all updated on Jose’s events!

See more((Below in English) Hola, me llamo José Luis García. Tengo 21 años viviendo en los Estados … José Luis García Jerónimo needs your support for Keep José Here!

gofundme.com

Keep José Here!, organized by José Luis García Jerónimo

((Below in English) Hola, me llamo José Luis García. Tengo 21 años viviendo en los Estados … José Luis García Jerónimo needs your support for Keep José Here!((Below in English) Hola, me llamo José Luis García. Tengo 21 años viviendo en los Estados … José Luis García Jerónimo needs your support for Keep José Here!

entry.title: Emergency Call to Action: We thought that with the Biden...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Emergency Call to Action: We thought that with the Biden administration things would change for many such as Jose Garcia but unfortunately that is not the case. He has been fighting his deportation process for 8 years and only a week ago he received the terrible news that they denied his case. He went into the system for a minor traffic infraction. It is all he has on his record. He is the father of 5 kids, owner of his home and they are only giving him 60 days to leave this ...country where 10 have already gone by. He will not give up and will keep fighting to stay with his family and asking for another opinion where he will be making several processes. One will be an application in an attempt to remove his voluntary leave. Another will be to reevaluate the case to see if any errors were made by the lawyer. The third is if we do find errors another lawyer will be taking his case and these costs will be up to $12,000. He will be working in creating events to fundraise through Sanctuary4All but you all can help him stay with his family. Help him by donating what is possible and sharing this on all your social media platforms. Thank you and we will keep you all updated on Jose’s events!

This weekend we’re selling pozole! It’s the perfect fall soup—hearty, spicy, and nutritious. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. All of the money raised will be for Lupe, who is recovering from surgery for renal cancer and a hernia. Yessenia and Gaby will be cooking.

Tomorrow we will have delicious green and red pozole, this meal is for Guadalupe, let's remember that she had two surgeries and we are preparing this meal to support !!

entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Tomorrow we will have delicious green and red pozole, this meal is for Guadalupe, let's remember that she had two surgeries and we are preparing this meal to support !!

entry.title: This weekend we’re selling pozole! It’s the perfect fall...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

This weekend we’re selling pozole! It’s the perfect fall soup—hearty, spicy, and nutritious. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. All of the money raised will be for Lupe, who is recovering from surgery for renal cancer and a hernia. Yessenia and Gaby will be cooking.

entry.title: Tomorrow Saturday it will be a bit cold and we will cook for you...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Tomorrow Saturday it will be a bit cold and we will cook for you a delicious pozole, you have your order today !!

entry.content:

action.momsrising.org
